titleStmt.title: Whereas at a parliament holden at Westminster in the fift yeere of King Richard the second, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie.,

notesStmt.note: Requiring licence from the King or Privy Council for all who travel abroad except merchants, etc.; forbidding export of gold and silver.
Dated at end: Westminster the ninth day of Iuly, in the fifth yeere of our reigne ... .
